name: Boltby's Big Day!
description:
Little Boltby gets a chance to have some fun and explore outside the factory he's lived in all his life!

Follow the path and collect all the bolts before time runs out!

Made for the Winter Buddy Up Jam 2022 by;

  • EvelynSays (Pixel art, menu systems, font)
  • Daphii (3D modelling & mapping, physics, video editing)

External assets used;

  • Music - cakeflaps on SoundCloud. via  'youreperfect' on Game Dev Market.
  • Skybox - Farland Skies on the Unity Asset Store.
  • Additional Props - Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack on the Unity Asset Store.
